name: Training Master
description:
You are trying to become a training master, a person with the knowledge that failing means progression, now you need to show off your training skill by dodging something impossible to dodge, to do that you must gather experience going through the bullets with your failed dodge. Good Luck!

Play with the arrow keys and space bar.

Exit with Esc (please do it only after winning the game, thx)

The music was downloaded in the website: https://freesound.org/people/tyops/sounds/275807/
